main.skills: With skills in technologies like Java, Spring, Git, SQL and Javascript.

about.subtitle: About Me
about.content:
I have been passionate about development since my college days when my computer science teacher introduced me to Scratch, interest increased shortly after when I met code.org. For a while, I immersed myself in block programming before getting into programming languages.

I studied Computer Technology, there I met several development tools. Since then and due to the constant evolution of technology, I became self-taught. Currently, I try to put all my knowledge into practice, both in my work and in the projects I carry out.

Because of my vision of creating solutions that improve the lives of others, I apply everything I learn in projects that I feel are practical not only for me, but for all the people who may come to visit them. But not all my life is programming, in my free time I like to exercise, share with my family, play videogames with my friends and strengthen my other passion, the music (I currently play guitar üé∏, piano in progressüéπ.).

ob1.head: Mercado Libre - 2024 / Currently
ob1.obs: I am part of the Checkout-On team, where we develop and maintain different applications to constantly improve the user shopping experience.

ob2.head: Giitic SAS - 2022 / 2024
ob2.obs: I develop and maintain the code of the different modules of the company, which are used by a variety of clients such as domicilios.com, Adama, Ripley and others.

ob3.head: Sergio Arboleda University / MINTIC Colombia - 2021
